notAllowHtmlBlockScript: (code-tabs) please turn on: Allow execution of scripts within HTML blocks,  otherwise tabs will not be displayed properly
fixAllTabs: Fix all code-tabs in current document
codeStyleChange: code background or style changes and reconfigure code-tabs stylesheet
errMsgGetBackground: code-tabs: Please open a document and change the theme or mode again!!!
noSelectedCodeBlock: Please select a code block and try again
headErrWhenCheckCode: Syntax error: blocks must start with :::. Example: ::: title | lang | active (lang optional, active optional)
noLangWhenCheckCode: Syntax error: missing language after ::: (optional, can be inferred or set explicitly like js/python)
noCodeWhenCheckCode: Syntax error: missing code content under the title (at least one line)
fixAllTabsErrMsg: An error was thrown during the fix, please check the custom attribute of the block
allTabsToCodeDes: Restore all code-tabs in the notebook to code-block
allTabsToCodeCompleted: Restore code-tabs to code-block completed, success count: {0}
allTabsToCodeCompletedFailed: Restore code-tabs to code-block completed, failed count: {0}
tabsToPlainCodeCompleted: Split into standard code blocks completed, success count: {0}
tabsToPlainCodeFailed: Split into standard code blocks completed, failed count: {0}
allTabsToPlainCode: Split all code-tabs into standard code blocks
allTabsToPlainCodeDes: Split all code-tabs in the notebook into standard code blocks
allCodeToTabsCompleted: Convert code-blocks to tabs completed, success count: {0}
allCodeToTabsCompletedFailed: Convert code-blocks to tabs completed, failed count: {0}
noTabsToUpgrade: No legacy code-tabs found to upgrade
mergeNeedMultipleBlocks: Select at least two code blocks
mergeContainsTabSyntax: Detected tab syntax blocks and expanded them before merging
debugLogSettingDesc: Enable debug logs and write to /data/plugins/code-tabs/debug.log
name: SiYuan
